mapper.insert: insert into product_order(order_amount, order_price, order_recipient, recipient_phone, recipient_address, order_status, board_num, client_num) values (#{orderAmount}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderRecipient}, #{recipientPhone}, #{recipientAddress}, #{orderStatus}, #{boardNum.boardNum}, #{clientNum.clientNum})
mapper.update: update product_order set order_amount = #{orderAmount}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, order_recipient = #{orderRecipient}, recipient_phone = #{recipientPhone}, recipient_address = #{recipientAddress} where order_num = #{orderNum}
update product_order set order_status = #{orderStatus} where order_num = #{orderNum}
mapper.select: select * from product_order, client where product_order.client_num = client.client_num and product_order.client_num = #{num} order by oder_date asc

select * from product_order, client, sa_board where product_order.client_num = client.client_num and product_order.board_num = sa_board.board_num and product_order.board_num = #{num} order by oder_date

select * from product_order, client, sa_board where product_order.client_num = client.client_num and product_order.board_num = sa_board.board_num and product_order.board_num = #{num} and order_status = #{status} order by oder_date

select * from sa_board, client, product_order where client.client_num = sa_board.client_num and product_order.board_num = sa_board.board_num and sa_board.client_num = #{num} order by product_order.oder_date

select sa_board.board_num, sa_board.board_title, sum(order_price) as order_price from client, sa_board, product_order where client.client_num = sa_board.client_num and sa_board.board_num = product_order.board_num and sa_board.client_num = #{num} group by sa_board.board_num
